channel.title: Crysis 1 being ported to XBLA and PSN
channel.description:
[url]https://www.ea.com/crysis-1[/url]
They should allow PC users who own crysis 1 to download this, just because it'd be nice with the improvements from CE3.

item.source: Crysis 1 being ported to XBLA and PSN

item.title: Crysis 1 being ported to XBLA and PSN
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
That is true, although I don’t think it would be that much work since most of the work is already done, they just can put the assets into CE3 - especially since its a very close evolution to CE2 - you can open CE2 things in CE3, if you have the assets it works fine - but they look a little weird. Regular people have been doing it, so I’m sure it wouldn’t be that hard for Crytek to do it without making lower res assets of the original (actually they probably just use the ones from lower settings, so they technically wouldn’t even need to make new versions)

Unless you mean it would be too much work to distribute like that.

And holy shit I thought those were two different locations. Didn’t even realize that at first.

talk about reduction of vegetation in the scene, thats like taking out the scene

Read full topic
item.source: Crysis 1 being ported to XBLA and PSN

item.title: Crysis 1 being ported to XBLA and PSN
item.dc:creator: gibbelin
item.description:
Yeah. CE3 has tons of improvements over CE2, if they used all the same textures the game would look fantastic. Not gonna happen though, it would be a ton of work for very little gain to release this version on PC. Plus, they’re using the Crysis 2 nanosuit control configuration, so it would be a bit of a different game.

Read full topic
